thread.title: UK- ASX rallies but this rare earth and uranium company is up 18.6%
thread.title_full: UK- ASX rallies but this rare earth and uranium company is up 18.6% | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: UK- ASX rallies but this rare earth and uranium company is up 18.6%
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors)Australian stocks have bounced back from a three session loss with the ASX200 rising 23.8 points or 0.4% to 5589.9.

Major miners were amongst the bigger gainers with BHP Billiton ( ASX:BHP ) up 1.1% to 25.54 and Fortescue Metals Group (ASX:FMG) rising 3.0% to 1.71.

Newcrest ( ASX:NCM ) is up 4.3% to 11.76 though Rio Tinto (ASX:RIO) fell 0.0% to 51.19.


Market Action hereâ€¦ 

Greenland Energy and Minerals ( ASX:GGG ) climbed 18.6% to 0.07 with almost 1.9 million shares traded.

The company is focused on finalising the Environmental and Social Impact Assessments for its Kvanefjeld Project in Greenland through the third quarter of 2015. 

This will be followed by the application for a mining licence.

Kvanefjeld has a maiden Ore Reserve of 108 8 million tonnes sufficient to underpin an initial 37 year mine-life.

Aziana Limited ( ASX:AZK ) is up 13.3% to 0.17 with more than 3.2 million shares traded.

Blue Chip Stocks 

Oil and Gas 

Oil Search ( ASX:OSH ) up 0.7% to 7.24
Santos ( ASX:STO ) down 1.0% to 7.09
Woodside Petroleum ( ASX:WPL ) up 0.3% to 33.78


Big 4 banks

Commonwealth Bank ( ASX:CBA ) up 0.3% to 86.12
National Australia Bank ( ASX:NAB ) down 0.3% to 33.81
Westpac ( ASX:WBC ) up 0.3% to 34.36


Other banks financials and industrials 

AMP ( ASX:AMP ) flat at 6.37
Bank of Queensland ( ASX:BOQ ) up 1.0% to 13.42
Bendigo and Adelaide Bank ( ASX:BEN ) up 0.1% to 13.00
Macquarie Group ( ASX:MQG ) down 0.2% to 81.30
Suncorp ( ASX:SUN ) up 0.6% to 14.23
Telstra ( ASX:TLS ) up 0.5% to 6.39

Retailers

Wesfarmers ( ASX:WES ) up 0.0% to 41.32
Woolworths ( ASX:WOW ) down 0.1% to 27.83
